page.title: 10HACKLINGE AREA LEISURE CLUBS
page.content: {Leisure}activites are varied: walking gardening, watching television,reading home-decorating, wine-making, knitting sewing, computer-games, sailing, sport fishing, swimming, scrabble, card- games,dominoes. Most clubs are connected with the Coal Mine: Miners' Welfare, Rugby, Football, Cricket, Bowls, Snooker, Gun, Fishing. Worth has a Cricket Club, two Women's Institutes, an Art class and a Garden- ers' Society. An Olde Tyme Dance Club at Eastry and a neighbouring Drama Group also have members from our area. Elderly people use the facilities of Help the Aged in Sandwich and the younger generation belong to Guides, Brownies, the Deal Air Cadet Training Squadron and the Army Cadet Corps at Sir Roger Manwood's Grammar School. Sandwich.
